Half Hour TV Show About Itagaki/Team Ninja!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): Half Hour TV Show About Itagaki/Team Ninja!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, January 13, 2005 - 08:18 pm:

On tonight, being shown twice, on G4TechTV, is a series called Icons, and one episode airing tonight is about DOA. There are some great shots of the Tecmo offices, Itagaki interviews and more!
